title: Reading together
creator_credit: Jenni Taplin and Latrobe University. School of Education. Media Centre
brief_description: Looks at the program being conducted at Reservoir East Primary School in which parents of children in infant grades are being encouraged to read with their children in order to facilitate the reading process. Show techniques that can used to stimulate reading. Narrated by Jeni Taplin. No other credits available.
